summary: This mod adds 20 more redguards to the base Skyrim continent. Each of these redguards are unique and are spread throughout the province.  The majority are marriage candidates.  No DLC Required.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 20 more redguards to the base Skyrim continent. Each of these redguards are unique and are spread throughout the province. Below are a list of each of them and where you might find them:

Dark Brotherhood

Blichin - He is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Blufaye - She is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Dawnstar

Klechem - She is a sailor staying at the inn (can marry)

Slafylrn - He is a city guard

Dragon Bridge

Jalibamka - She is a town guard

Riften

F'ithja - He is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Whina - She is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Solitude

Chirtja - He is a member of the Bards College (can marry)

Fhaston - He is a city guard

Jonnyin - She is a bard at the inn (can marry)

Monserva - She is a member of the Bards college (can marry)

Whiterun

Chofyl'kern - He is an adventurer staying at the Drunken Huntsman (can marry)

Dhuctte - She is a member of the Companions (can marry)

Sheramka - She is a sailor turned bard at the Bannered Mare (can marry)

Talielm - He is a member of the Companions (can marry)

Windhelm

Namatis - He is a bard at the main inn (can marry)

Raightur - He is a sailor staying at the inn (can marry)

Winterhold

Alussandra - She is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

V'arkem - He is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

V'octfa - She is a city guard

Changelog:
V1:
-The initial release.

Known Bugs:
None at this time.

Note:
some voices will not sound Redguard.Â  This is due to a basic Bethesda limitation.

Also, this is the last mod in the More NPC series.

author: Arron Dominion
